thread.title: OC Cars & Mobility Ltd offers new and used cars for sale in Dublin
thread.title_full: OC Cars & Mobility Ltd offers new and used cars for sale in Dublin

title: OC Cars & Mobility Ltd offers new and used cars for sale in Dublin
text: OC Cars & Mobility Ltd offers new and used cars for sale in Dublin OC Cars & Mobility Ltd. Is a Dublin based firm sells a wide range of both new and used cars. They specialize in selling a large selection of Wheelchair Accessible cars and vehicles. Ireland, 11 September 2015 -- Cars are predominately become a necessity in almost every corner of the world. For some it may be a necessity while for some it is both a necessity and a luxury. The market for both new and used cars has always been there irrespective of the economic slowdown. There are various companies that offer both the options for cars and presents different cars from reputable brands for sale. However, it is very important that people purchase cars from reputed and certified sellers. Especially, when customers are buying used cars it is important to buy them from reliable sellers. OC Cars & Mobility Ltd is one of the experienced names that deal in selling both new and used cars in Dublin. They offer a wide selection of Wheelchair Accessible cars and vehicles.The company has been in the industry for over 30 years and built a strong name for them. Besides selling of cars, the company also offers onsite servicing to its customers. It includes body repairing and valeting as well. OC Cars & Mobility has its own team of dedicated professionals who are trained as per the latest technology. The company is known to offer wheelchair cars for disabled passengers and drivers besides the normal kinds of vehicles. People can even choose the right base vehicle, adaptation and seating plans as per their needs and requirements. The company is accredited to NSAI approved fitting center and meets the IVA as well as SQI certification standards. Like any other city in the world, wheelchair cars Dublin are available for different needs suiting different kinds of disabilities. OC Cars & Mobility Ltd. Masters this art and presently offers almost all kinds of wheelchair accessible cars Dublin. The options range from wheelchair passenger cars & vans, drive from the wheelchair vehicles, automatic adapted vehicles, etc. In case people wish, the company offers its services for home demonstration of its vehicles as well. All information about their products and services could be accessed from their website. Moreover, customers can ring them on their toll free numbers and get instant answers to their queries. Therefore, irrespective of the fact that you are looking for new or used cars Dublin, the company offers them all. Aided by expert consultations and a wide range of customization options, their services serve the need of virtually every customer. It may be a small car or a big one; they can offer almost all cars for every need. # # # http://www.occars.ie/ OC Cars & Mobility Ltd. is a Dublin based company which deals in new and used cars. The company specializes in offering different kinds of customized options for wheelchair accessible cars. For more information on their products and services, customers can visit their website. Submitted by Keith Bowen on Friday, 11 September 2015 at 1:26 PM
